title: Howdy Partner
developerAddress: House # 616, Street # 69, Sector I-8/3, Islamabad, Pakistan.
description: Yeehaa Cowboy, this is the watch face that gives you the feeling of being the sheriff of the crime towm. The Hat and mustaches animation is made by using illustration design and keeps a fear in the eyes of the outlaws. The time is digital display with day and date in numeric. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which save the battery just by showing the time.
descriptionHTML: Yeehaa Cowboy, this is the watch face that gives you the feeling of being the sheriff of the crime towm. The Hat and mustaches animation is made by using illustration design and keeps a fear in the eyes of the outlaws. The time is digital display with day and date in numeric. When the watch is not in use the watch face goes into ambient mode which save the battery just by showing the time.
comments: I like this watch face, however, the date seems to be stuck on September,16.    Is it showing the year instead of the day? (the day of the week is correct)
